name: Barricade defense
description:
Play in full screen mode

In this game you gather an army of magicians to protect the castle from enemies who are trying to break through to it.

The game has cycles that last for 10 seconds, with each cycle the game becomes more difficult (but this is not accurate).

How to play?

1. The player defends a barricade located at one end of the game map.

2. At the other end of the map are enemies that are moving towards the barricade, trying to destroy it.

3. Magicians kill enemies, for which he receives money.

4. Using money, the player can hire magicians who will protect the barricade.

5. The offensive wave lasts 10 seconds, during which the player must destroy enemies and earn money to buy new mages.

6. After 10 seconds, there is a break between waves so that the player can buy mages.

7. The goal of the game is to survive as long as possible
